document.docAuthor: Tuf, Ivan Hadrián, Ivinskis, Povilas & Rimšaitė, Jolanta
document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the centipedes (Chilopoda) of Lithuania

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the centipedes (Chilopoda) of Lithuania

subSubSection.paragraph:
This species is reported from southernmost Sweden (
Andersson et al. 2008
, 2013 ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Lithobius (Lithobius) erythrocephalus C.L. Koch, 1847
Lithobius erythrocephalus
—
Zalesskaja 1978
: 136

subSubSection.paragraph:
Records from Lithuania : LOC 12 : 12.08 .– 24.08.2014 , 1 ind.; LOC 34 : 0
4 . 10.2004
, 1 ind. This species is reported from southernmost Sweden (
Andersson et al. 2008
, 2013 ) as well as Białowieża National Park in Poland (
Wytwer 1999
).

Records from Lithuania : LOC 22 : 18.06 .– 13.07.2005 , 1 ind.; LOC 29 : 0
1 . 10.2009
, 1 ind. In surrounding countries, reported only from southernmost Sweden (
Andersson et al. 2008
, 2013 ) and Białowieża National Park in Poland (
Wytwer 1999
).

In nearby surroundings, also known from Swedish island Gotska Sandön (
Andersson et al. 2008
, 2013 ), Latvia (Trautberg 1929 ; Jeekel 1964 ;
Zalesskaja 1978
) and Finland (
Domander 1938
; Palmén 1948 , 1988 ).

Records from Lithuania : LOC03: 11.06.2012 – 20.10.2014 , 32 ind.; LOC09: 28.07 .– 11.08.2014 , 1 ind.; LOC 10 : 06.10.– 20.10.2014 , 1 ind.; LOC 17 :
19 . 10.2014
, 3 ind.; LOC 19 : 15 .0 9.1988 , 2 ind.; LOC 22 : 18.06 .– 13.07.2005 , 1 ind.; LOC 24 : 01.06.– 10.06.2007 , 3 ind.; LOC 33 : 0
4 . 10.2004
, 2 ind., 11.08 .– 29.8.2010 , 8 ind., 20 .0 9.2010 , 5 ind. In nearby surroundings, also known from Latvia (Trautberg 1929 ; Jeekel 1964 ), Swedish island Gotska Sandön (
Lohmander 1925
), Finland (
Domander 1938
; Palmén 1948 , 1988 ), Białowieża National Park in Poland (
Wytwer 1999
) and Belarus (
Zalesskaja 1978
).
